column5: Got up to Algonquin a week after opening season. After a grouling trip in (approx. 50klm), we finally arrived at our piece of paradise. Fishing was good but was hoping to catch a big one this year. My P.B is 5.9lbs, 26" and this year the biggest I managed was 20", maybe 3lbs? Oh well, was a really great time. I'm thinking about retiring this spot due to the difficulty getting in there. I'm going to go back to my old spot which is a longer drive but far less work for the same payout. Here are a couple pics.
